snippet.title: 【Murders on the Yangtze River】 PV - 「The Haunted Furnace」
snippet.description:
Hey guys, great to meet you all! This is our very first video on Youtube, and we're super excited to share it with you!

We're indie game developer in Beijing and currently developing a detective game, "Murders on the Yangtze River 山河旅探". 

We're huge fans of "Ace Attorney" and we really wanted to create a Chinese-style detective game with engaging stories, memorable characters and above all,  rigorous logical reasoing.

In this game, you'll take on the role of a refined gentleman, John Shen, with a sharp intellect, embarking on a journey through early 20th century China to solve a series of intriguing cases along the Yangtze River.

If this sounds like something you'd be interested in, be sure to add "Murders on the Yangtze River" to your Steam wishlist!✅In April 12, we will release a  free English DEMO in Steam Eastern Game Fest!

This video is a brief introduction to Case III——
「The Haunted Furnace」
A worker in Hanyang Iron Works are witnessed to dive into a burning hot lable full of molten steel. Rumors said he sacrificed himself to gods as old legends says "steel transformation requires a human sacrifice". However, the truth is not as simple as it may seem.
